Reckingen VS railway station (), is a railway station in the locality of Reckingen-Gluringen, within the municipality of Goms, in the Swiss canton of Valais. It is an intermediate stop on the  metre gauge Furka Oberalp line of the Matterhorn Gotthard Bahn and is served by local trains only.
Services
the following services stop at Reckingen VS:
* Regio: hourly service between  and .
